SELECT
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP_CANCEL"."MANDT" || '::' || 
        "VBRP_CANCEL"."VBELN" || '::' || "VBRP_CANCEL"."POSNR"                              AS "ID",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRP"."VBELN" 
        || '::' || "VBRP"."POSNR"                                                           AS "ObjectID", -- the docuemnt item that is canceled 
	CAST("VBRK_CANCEL"."ERDAT" AS DATE) +
        CAST(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, CAST("VBRK_CANCEL"."ERZET" AS DATE), 
        "VBRK_CANCEL"."ERZET") AS INTERVAL SECOND)                                          AS "Time",
    'Cancellation'                                                                          AS "Attribute",
    NULL                                                                                    AS "OldValue",
    NULL                                                                                    AS "NewValue",
	CASE
        WHEN "USR02"."USTYP" IN ('B', 'C') THEN 'Automatic'
        ELSE 'Manual' 
     END                                                                                    AS "ExecutionType",
	<%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRK_CANCEL"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRK_CANCEL"."ERNAM"     AS "ChangedBy",
	'CustomerInvoiceCancellation'                                                           AS "OperationType", -- the document type that canceled the document item
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRK_CANCEL"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRK_CANCEL"."VBELN"     AS "OperationID"  -- the document that canceled the document item
FROM "VBRK" AS "VBRK"
         LEFT JOIN "VBRP" AS "VBRP"
                   ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "VBRK"."MANDT"
                       AND "VBRP"."VBELN" = "VBRK"."VBELN"
         LEFT JOIN "VBFA" AS "VBFA"
                   ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "VBFA"."MANDT"
                       AND "VBRP"."VBELN" = "VBFA"."VBELV"
                       AND "VBRP"."POSNR" = "VBFA"."POSNV"
                       AND "VBFA"."VBTYP_V" = 'M'
                       AND "VBFA"."VBTYP_N" = 'N'
                       AND "VBFA"."STUFE" = '00'
         LEFT JOIN "VBRP" AS "VBRP_CANCEL"
                   ON "VBRP_CANCEL"."MANDT" = "VBFA"."MANDT"
                       AND "VBRP_CANCEL"."VBELN" = "VBFA"."VBELN"
                       AND "VBRP_CANCEL"."POSNR" = "VBFA"."POSNN"
                       AND "VBRP_CANCEL"."VGTYP" IN ('C', 'J')
         LEFT JOIN "VBRK" AS "VBRK_CANCEL"
                   ON "VBRP_CANCEL"."MANDT" = "VBRK_CANCEL"."MANDT"
                       AND "VBRP_CANCEL"."VBELN" = "VBRK_CANCEL"."VBELN"
         LEFT JOIN "USR02" AS "USR02"
                   ON "VBRP_CANCEL"."MANDT" = "USR02"."MANDT"
                       AND "VBRP_CANCEL"."ERNAM" = "USR02"."BNAME"
WHERE "VBRK"."MANDT" IS NOT NULL
    AND "VBRP_CANCEL"."MANDT" IS NOT NULL

UNION

SELECT
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP_CANCEL"."MANDT" || '::' || 
        "VBRP_CANCEL"."VBELN" || '::' || "VBRP_CANCEL"."POSNR"                              AS "ID",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRP"."VBELN" 
        || '::' || "VBRP"."POSNR"                                                           AS "ObjectID", -- the docuemnt item that is canceled 
	CAST("VBRK_CANCEL"."ERDAT" AS DATE) +
        CAST(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, CAST("VBRK_CANCEL"."ERZET" AS DATE), 
        "VBRK_CANCEL"."ERZET") AS INTERVAL SECOND)                                          AS "Time",
    'Cancellation'                                                                          AS "Attribute",
    NULL                                                                                    AS "OldValue",
    NULL                                                                                    AS "NewValue",
	CASE
        WHEN "USR02"."USTYP" IN ('B', 'C') THEN 'Automatic'
        ELSE 'Manual' 
     END                                                                                    AS "ExecutionType",
	<%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRK_CANCEL"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRK_CANCEL"."ERNAM"     AS "ChangedBy",
	'DebitMemoCancellation'                                                                 AS "OperationType", -- the document type that canceled the document item
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRK_CANCEL"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRK_CANCEL"."VBELN"     AS "OperationID"  -- the document that canceled the document item
FROM "VBRK" AS "VBRK"
         LEFT JOIN "VBRP" AS "VBRP"
                   ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "VBRK"."MANDT"
                       AND "VBRP"."VBELN" = "VBRK"."VBELN"
         LEFT JOIN "VBFA" AS "VBFA"
                   ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "VBFA"."MANDT"
                       AND "VBRP"."VBELN" = "VBFA"."VBELV"
                       AND "VBRP"."POSNR" = "VBFA"."POSNV"
                       AND "VBFA"."VBTYP_V" = 'P'
                       AND "VBFA"."VBTYP_N" = 'N'
                       AND "VBFA"."STUFE" = '00'
         LEFT JOIN "VBRP" AS "VBRP_CANCEL"
                   ON "VBRP_CANCEL"."MANDT" = "VBFA"."MANDT"
                       AND "VBRP_CANCEL"."VBELN" = "VBFA"."VBELN"
                       AND "VBRP_CANCEL"."POSNR" = "VBFA"."POSNN"
                       AND "VBRP_CANCEL"."VGTYP" = 'L'
         LEFT JOIN "VBRK" AS "VBRK_CANCEL"
                   ON "VBRP_CANCEL"."MANDT" = "VBRK_CANCEL"."MANDT"
                       AND "VBRP_CANCEL"."VBELN" = "VBRK_CANCEL"."VBELN"
         LEFT JOIN "USR02" AS "USR02"
                   ON "VBRP_CANCEL"."MANDT" = "USR02"."MANDT"
                       AND "VBRP_CANCEL"."ERNAM" = "USR02"."BNAME"
WHERE "VBRK"."MANDT" IS NOT NULL
    AND "VBRP_CANCEL"."MANDT" IS NOT NULL
    AND "VBFA"."STUFE" = '00'

UNION

SELECT
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP_CANCEL"."MANDT" || '::' || 
        "VBRP_CANCEL"."VBELN" || '::' || "VBRP_CANCEL"."POSNR"                              AS "ID",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRP"."VBELN" 
        || '::' || "VBRP"."POSNR"                                                           AS "ObjectID",
	CAST("VBRK_CANCEL"."ERDAT" AS DATE) 
            + CAST(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, CAST("VBRK_CANCEL"."ERZET" AS DATE),
            "VBRK_CANCEL"."ERZET") AS INTERVAL SECOND)                                      AS "Time",
    'Cancellation'                                                                          AS "Attribute",
    NULL                                                                                    AS "OldValue",
    NULL                                                                                    AS "NewValue",
	CASE
        WHEN "USR02"."USTYP" IN ('B', 'C') THEN 'Automatic'
        ELSE 'Manual' 
     END                                                                                    AS "ExecutionType",
	<%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRK_CANCEL"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRK_CANCEL"."ERNAM"     AS "ChangedBy",
    'CreditMemoCancellation'                                                                AS "OperationType",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRK_CANCEL"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRK_CANCEL"."VBELN"     AS "OperationID"
FROM "VBRK" AS "VBRK" --- Cancelled 
         LEFT JOIN "VBRP" AS "VBRP"
                   ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "VBRK"."MANDT"
                       AND "VBRP"."VBELN" = "VBRK"."VBELN"
         LEFT JOIN "VBFA" AS "VBFA"
                   ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "VBFA"."MANDT"
                       AND "VBRP"."VBELN" = "VBFA"."VBELV"
                       AND "VBRP"."POSNR" = "VBFA"."POSNV"
                       AND "VBFA"."VBTYP_V" = 'O'
                       AND "VBFA"."VBTYP_N" = 'S'
                       AND "VBFA"."STUFE" = '00'
         LEFT JOIN "VBRP" AS "VBRP_CANCEL" -- Cancellation
                   ON "VBRP_CANCEL"."MANDT" = "VBFA"."MANDT"
                       AND "VBRP_CANCEL"."VBELN" = "VBFA"."VBELN"
                       AND "VBRP_CANCEL"."POSNR" = "VBFA"."POSNN"
         LEFT JOIN "VBRK" AS "VBRK_CANCEL"
                   ON "VBRP_CANCEL"."MANDT" = "VBRK_CANCEL"."MANDT"
                       AND "VBRP_CANCEL"."VBELN" = "VBRK_CANCEL"."VBELN"                       
         LEFT JOIN "USR02" AS "USR02"
                   ON "VBRP_CANCEL"."MANDT" = "USR02"."MANDT"
                       AND "VBRP_CANCEL"."ERNAM" = "USR02"."BNAME"
WHERE "VBRK"."MANDT" IS NOT NULL
    AND "VBRP_CANCEL"."MANDT" IS NOT NULL

property_sql_factory_datasets.sql:
WITH "CTE_Relationships" AS (
    -- Debit memo items following invoice items
    SELECT
        <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBFA"."MANDT" || '::' || 
            "VBFA"."VBELV"                                        AS "SourceCustomerInvoice",
        <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBFA"."MANDT" || '::' || 
            "VBFA"."VBELV" || '::' || "VBFA"."POSNV"              AS "SourceCustomerInvoiceLine",
        'CustomerInvoice'                                         AS "SourceDocumentType",
        <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBFA"."MANDT" || '::' || 
            "VBFA"."VBELN"                                        AS "TargetCustomerInvoice",
        <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBFA"."MANDT" || '::' || 
            "VBFA"."VBELN" || '::' || "VBFA"."POSNN"              AS "TargetCustomerInvoiceLine",
        'DebitMemo'                                               AS "TargetDocumentType"
    FROM VBFA
    WHERE "VBFA"."VBTYP_V" = 'M' -- Invoice
        AND "VBFA"."VBTYP_N" = 'P' -- Debit Memo
        AND "VBFA"."STUFE" = '01' -- Skipping Debit Memo Request
        AND EXISTS ( 
        SELECT 1
        FROM "VBFA" AS "VBFA_CMR"
        WHERE "VBFA_CMR"."VBELV" = "VBFA"."VBELV"
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."POSNV" = "VBFA"."POSNV"
            -- check that for the invoice a direct link (STUFE 00) 
            -- to a debit memo request exists.
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."VBTYP_N" = 'L'
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."STUFE" = '00'
        )
        AND EXISTS (
        SELECT 1
        FROM "VBFA" AS "VBFA_CMR"
        WHERE "VBFA_CMR"."VBELN" = "VBFA"."VBELN"
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."POSNN" = "VBFA"."POSNN"
            -- check that for the debit memo a direct link (STUFE 00) 
            -- to a debit memo request exists.
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."VBTYP_V" = 'L'
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."STUFE" = '00'
        )

    UNION ALL 

    -- Credit memo items following invoice items
    SELECT
        <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBFA"."MANDT" || '::' || 
            "VBFA"."VBELV"                                        AS "SourceCustomerInvoice",
        <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBFA"."MANDT" || '::' || 
            "VBFA"."VBELV" || '::' || "VBFA"."POSNV"              AS "SourceCustomerInvoiceLine",
        'CustomerInvoice'                                         AS "SourceDocumentType",
        
        <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBFA"."MANDT" || '::' || 
            "VBFA"."VBELN"                                        AS "TargetCustomerInvoice",
        <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBFA"."MANDT" || '::' || 
            "VBFA"."VBELN" || '::' || "VBFA"."POSNN"              AS "TargetCustomerInvoiceLine",
        'CreditMemo'                                              AS "TargetDocumentType"
    FROM VBFA
    WHERE "VBFA"."VBTYP_V" = 'M' -- Invoice
        AND "VBFA"."VBTYP_N" = 'O' -- Credit Memo
        AND "VBFA"."STUFE" = '01' -- Skipping Credit Memo Request
        AND EXISTS ( 
        SELECT 1
        FROM "VBFA" AS "VBFA_CMR"
        WHERE "VBFA_CMR"."VBELV" = "VBFA"."VBELV"
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."POSNV" = "VBFA"."POSNV"
            -- check that for the invoice a direct link (STUFE 00) 
            -- to a credit memo request exists.
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."VBTYP_N" = 'K'
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."STUFE" = '00'
        )
        AND EXISTS (
        SELECT 1
        FROM "VBFA" AS "VBFA_CMR"
        WHERE "VBFA_CMR"."VBELN" = "VBFA"."VBELN"
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."POSNN" = "VBFA"."POSNN"
            -- check that for the credit memo a direct link (STUFE 00) 
            -- to a credit memo request exists.
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."VBTYP_V" = 'K'
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."STUFE" = '00'
        )
)
SELECT
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || 
        "VBRP"."VBELN" || '::' || "VBRP"."POSNR"                                        AS "ID",
	<%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT"                                         AS "SourceSystemInstance",
	"VBRP"."NETWR"                                                                      AS "NetAmount",
	"VBRP"."VRKME"                                                                      AS "QuantityUnit",
	"VBRP"."FKIMG"                                                                      AS "Quantity",
	CASE 
        WHEN "VBRP"."NETWR" = 0 AND "VBRP"."FKIMG" = 0 THEN 0 
        ELSE "VBRP"."NETWR" / "VBRP"."FKIMG" 
     END                                                                                AS "NetUnitPrice",
	"VBRK"."WAERK"                                                                      AS "Currency",
	CAST("VBRP"."POSNR" AS VARCHAR(255))                                                AS "CustomerInvoiceLineNumber",
	"VBRK"."VBELN"                                                                      AS "CustomerInvoiceNumber",
	CAST("VBRP"."ERDAT" AS DATE) +
            CAST(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, CAST("VBRP"."ERZET" AS DATE), 
            "VBRP"."ERZET") AS INTERVAL SECOND)                                         AS "CreationTime",
	CASE WHEN "USR02"."USTYP" IN ('B', 'C') THEN 'Automatic' ELSE 'Manual' END          AS "CreationExecutionType",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRP"."ERNAM"               AS "CreatedBy",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRK"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRK"."VBELN"               AS "CustomerInvoice",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRP"."MATNR"               AS "Material",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRP"."WERKS"               AS "Plant",
    "CTE_Relationships"."SourceCustomerInvoice"                                         AS "PreviousCustomerInvoice",
    "CTE_Relationships"."SourceCustomerInvoiceLine"                                     AS "PreviousCustomerInvoiceLine"
FROM "VBRP" AS "VBRP"
    LEFT JOIN "VBRK" AS "VBRK"
            ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "VBRK"."MANDT"
                AND "VBRP"."VBELN" = "VBRK"."VBELN"
    LEFT JOIN "USR02" AS "USR02"
            ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "USR02"."MANDT"
                AND "VBRP"."ERNAM" = "USR02"."BNAME"
    LEFT JOIN "CTE_Relationships" AS "CTE_Relationships" 
            ON <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || 
                "VBRP"."VBELN" || '::' || "VBRP"."POSNR" =
                "CTE_Relationships"."TargetCustomerInvoiceLine"
WHERE "VBRP"."MANDT" IS NOT NULL
    AND "VBRK"."VBTYP" in ('M', 'O', 'P')

sql_factory_datasets.sql:
SELECT 
    <%=sourceSystem%>  || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRP"."VBELN" || '::' || "VBRP"."POSNR"              AS "ID",
	<%=sourceSystem%>  || '::' || "LIPS"."MANDT" || '::' || "LIPS"."VBELN" || '::' || "LIPS"."POSNR"              AS "DeliveryLines"
FROM (SELECT "VBRP"."MANDT" AS "MANDT",
             "VBRP"."VGBEL" AS "VGBEL",
             "VBRP"."VGPOS" AS "VGPOS",
             "VBRP"."VBELN" AS "VBELN",
             "VBRP"."POSNR" AS "POSNR"
      FROM "VBRP" AS "VBRP"
          INNER JOIN "VBRK" AS "VBRK"
      ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "VBRK"."MANDT"
          AND "VBRP"."VBELN" = "VBRK"."VBELN"
          AND "VBRK"."VBTYP" = 'M'
      ORDER BY "VBRP"."MANDT", "VBRP"."VGBEL", "VBRP"."VGPOS") AS "VBRP"
        INNER JOIN "LIPS" AS "LIPS"
            ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "LIPS"."MANDT"
                AND "VBRP"."VGBEL" = "LIPS"."VBELN"
                AND "VBRP"."VGPOS" = "LIPS"."POSNR"
        LEFT JOIN "LIKP"
            ON "LIPS"."MANDT" = "LIKP"."MANDT"
            AND "LIPS"."VBELN" = "LIKP"."VBELN"
WHERE "LIKP"."VBTYP" = 'J'

SELECT 
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRP"."VBELN" || '::' || "VBRP"."POSNR"                                                           AS "ID",
	<%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBEP"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBEP"."VBELN" || '::' || "VBEP"."POSNR" || COALESCE('::' || "VBEP"."ETENR", '')                   AS "SalesOrderScheduleLines"
FROM "VBRP" AS "VBRP"
INNER JOIN "VBRK" AS "VBRK"
      ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "VBRK"."MANDT"
        AND "VBRP"."VBELN" = "VBRK"."VBELN"
        AND "VBRK"."VBTYP" = 'M'
INNER JOIN "VBEP" AS "VBEP"
    ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "VBEP"."MANDT"
        AND "VBRP"."AUBEL" = "VBEP"."VBELN"
        AND "VBRP"."AUPOS" = "VBEP"."POSNR"
INNER JOIN "VBAK" AS "VBAK"
    ON "VBEP"."MANDT" = "VBAK"."MANDT"
        AND "VBEP"."VBELN" = "VBAK"."VBELN"
        AND "VBAK"."VBTYP" IN ('C', 'I')

WITH "CTE_Relationships" AS (
    -- Debit memo items following invoice items
    SELECT
        <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBFA"."MANDT" || '::' || 
            "VBFA"."VBELV"                                        AS "SourceCustomerInvoice",
        <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBFA"."MANDT" || '::' || 
            "VBFA"."VBELV" || '::' || "VBFA"."POSNV"              AS "SourceCustomerInvoiceLine",
        'CustomerInvoice'                                         AS "SourceDocumentType",
        <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBFA"."MANDT" || '::' || 
            "VBFA"."VBELN"                                        AS "TargetCustomerInvoice",
        <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBFA"."MANDT" || '::' || 
            "VBFA"."VBELN" || '::' || "VBFA"."POSNN"              AS "TargetCustomerInvoiceLine",
        'DebitMemo'                                               AS "TargetDocumentType"
    FROM VBFA
    WHERE "VBFA"."VBTYP_V" = 'M' -- Invoice
        AND "VBFA"."VBTYP_N" = 'P' -- Debit Memo
        AND "VBFA"."STUFE" = '01' -- Skipping Debit Memo Request
        AND EXISTS ( 
        SELECT 1
        FROM "VBFA" AS "VBFA_CMR"
        WHERE "VBFA_CMR"."VBELV" = "VBFA"."VBELV"
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."POSNV" = "VBFA"."POSNV"
            -- check that for the invoice a direct link (STUFE 00) 
            -- to a debit memo request exists.
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."VBTYP_N" = 'L'
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."STUFE" = '00'
        )
        AND EXISTS (
        SELECT 1
        FROM "VBFA" AS "VBFA_CMR"
        WHERE "VBFA_CMR"."VBELN" = "VBFA"."VBELN"
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."POSNN" = "VBFA"."POSNN"
            -- check that for the debit memo a direct link (STUFE 00) 
            -- to a debit memo request exists.
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."VBTYP_V" = 'L'
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."STUFE" = '00'
        )

    UNION ALL 

    -- Credit memo items following invoice items
    SELECT
        <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBFA"."MANDT" || '::' || 
            "VBFA"."VBELV"                                        AS "SourceCustomerInvoice",
        <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBFA"."MANDT" || '::' || 
            "VBFA"."VBELV" || '::' || "VBFA"."POSNV"              AS "SourceCustomerInvoiceLine",
        'CustomerInvoice'                                         AS "SourceDocumentType",
        
        <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBFA"."MANDT" || '::' || 
            "VBFA"."VBELN"                                        AS "TargetCustomerInvoice",
        <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBFA"."MANDT" || '::' || 
            "VBFA"."VBELN" || '::' || "VBFA"."POSNN"              AS "TargetCustomerInvoiceLine",
        'CreditMemo'                                              AS "TargetDocumentType"
    FROM VBFA
    WHERE "VBFA"."VBTYP_V" = 'M' -- Invoice
        AND "VBFA"."VBTYP_N" = 'O' -- Credit Memo
        AND "VBFA"."STUFE" = '01' -- Skipping Credit Memo Request
        AND EXISTS ( 
        SELECT 1
        FROM "VBFA" AS "VBFA_CMR"
        WHERE "VBFA_CMR"."VBELV" = "VBFA"."VBELV"
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."POSNV" = "VBFA"."POSNV"
            -- check that for the invoice a direct link (STUFE 00) 
            -- to a credit memo request exists.
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."VBTYP_N" = 'K'
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."STUFE" = '00'
        )
        AND EXISTS (
        SELECT 1
        FROM "VBFA" AS "VBFA_CMR"
        WHERE "VBFA_CMR"."VBELN" = "VBFA"."VBELN"
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."POSNN" = "VBFA"."POSNN"
            -- check that for the credit memo a direct link (STUFE 00) 
            -- to a credit memo request exists.
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."VBTYP_V" = 'K'
            AND "VBFA_CMR"."STUFE" = '00'
        )
)
SELECT
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || 
        "VBRP"."VBELN" || '::' || "VBRP"."POSNR"                                        AS "ID",
	<%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT"                                         AS "SourceSystemInstance",
	"VBRP"."NETWR"                                                                      AS "NetAmount",
	"VBRP"."VRKME"                                                                      AS "QuantityUnit",
	"VBRP"."FKIMG"                                                                      AS "Quantity",
	CASE 
        WHEN "VBRP"."NETWR" = 0 AND "VBRP"."FKIMG" = 0 THEN 0 
        ELSE "VBRP"."NETWR" / "VBRP"."FKIMG" 
     END                                                                                AS "NetUnitPrice",
	"VBRK"."WAERK"                                                                      AS "Currency",
	CAST("VBRP"."POSNR" AS VARCHAR(255))                                                AS "CustomerInvoiceLineNumber",
	"VBRK"."VBELN"                                                                      AS "CustomerInvoiceNumber",
	CAST("VBRP"."ERDAT" AS DATE) +
            CAST(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, CAST("VBRP"."ERZET" AS DATE), 
            "VBRP"."ERZET") AS INTERVAL SECOND)                                         AS "CreationTime",
	CASE WHEN "USR02"."USTYP" IN ('B', 'C') THEN 'Automatic' ELSE 'Manual' END          AS "CreationExecutionType",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRP"."ERNAM"               AS "CreatedBy",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRK"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRK"."VBELN"               AS "CustomerInvoice",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRP"."MATNR"               AS "Material",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRP"."WERKS"               AS "Plant",
    "CTE_Relationships"."SourceCustomerInvoice"                                         AS "PreviousCustomerInvoice",
    "CTE_Relationships"."SourceCustomerInvoiceLine"                                     AS "PreviousCustomerInvoiceLine"
FROM "VBRP" AS "VBRP"
    LEFT JOIN "VBRK" AS "VBRK"
            ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "VBRK"."MANDT"
                AND "VBRP"."VBELN" = "VBRK"."VBELN"
    LEFT JOIN "USR02" AS "USR02"
            ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "USR02"."MANDT"
                AND "VBRP"."ERNAM" = "USR02"."BNAME"
    LEFT JOIN "CTE_Relationships" AS "CTE_Relationships" 
            ON <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || 
                "VBRP"."VBELN" || '::' || "VBRP"."POSNR" =
                "CTE_Relationships"."TargetCustomerInvoiceLine"
WHERE "VBRP"."MANDT" IS NOT NULL
    AND "VBRK"."VBTYP" in ('M', 'O', 'P')

sql_factory_datasets.sql:
SELECT 
    <%=sourceSystem%>  || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRP"."VBELN" || '::' || "VBRP"."POSNR"              AS "ID",
	<%=sourceSystem%>  || '::' || "LIPS"."MANDT" || '::' || "LIPS"."VBELN" || '::' || "LIPS"."POSNR"              AS "DeliveryLines"
FROM (SELECT "VBRP"."MANDT" AS "MANDT",
             "VBRP"."VGBEL" AS "VGBEL",
             "VBRP"."VGPOS" AS "VGPOS",
             "VBRP"."VBELN" AS "VBELN",
             "VBRP"."POSNR" AS "POSNR"
      FROM "VBRP" AS "VBRP"
          INNER JOIN "VBRK" AS "VBRK"
      ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "VBRK"."MANDT"
          AND "VBRP"."VBELN" = "VBRK"."VBELN"
          AND "VBRK"."VBTYP" = 'M'
      ORDER BY "VBRP"."MANDT", "VBRP"."VGBEL", "VBRP"."VGPOS") AS "VBRP"
        INNER JOIN "LIPS" AS "LIPS"
            ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "LIPS"."MANDT"
                AND "VBRP"."VGBEL" = "LIPS"."VBELN"
                AND "VBRP"."VGPOS" = "LIPS"."POSNR"
        LEFT JOIN "LIKP"
            ON "LIPS"."MANDT" = "LIKP"."MANDT"
            AND "LIPS"."VBELN" = "LIKP"."VBELN"
WHERE "LIKP"."VBTYP" = 'J'

SELECT 
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRP"."VBELN" || '::' || "VBRP"."POSNR"                                                           AS "ID",
	<%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBEP"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBEP"."VBELN" || '::' || "VBEP"."POSNR" || COALESCE('::' || "VBEP"."ETENR", '')                   AS "SalesOrderScheduleLines"
FROM "VBRP" AS "VBRP"
INNER JOIN "VBRK" AS "VBRK"
      ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "VBRK"."MANDT"
        AND "VBRP"."VBELN" = "VBRK"."VBELN"
        AND "VBRK"."VBTYP" = 'M'
INNER JOIN "VBEP" AS "VBEP"
    ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "VBEP"."MANDT"
        AND "VBRP"."AUBEL" = "VBEP"."VBELN"
        AND "VBRP"."AUPOS" = "VBEP"."POSNR"
INNER JOIN "VBAK" AS "VBAK"
    ON "VBEP"."MANDT" = "VBAK"."MANDT"
        AND "VBEP"."VBELN" = "VBAK"."VBELN"
        AND "VBAK"."VBTYP" IN ('C', 'I')

     END                                                                                AS "NetUnitPrice",
	"VBRK"."WAERK"                                                                      AS "Currency",
	CAST("VBRP"."POSNR" AS VARCHAR(255))                                                AS "CustomerInvoiceLineNumber",
	"VBRK"."VBELN"                                                                      AS "CustomerInvoiceNumber",
	CAST("VBRP"."ERDAT" AS DATE) +
            CAST(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, CAST("VBRP"."ERZET" AS DATE), 
            "VBRP"."ERZET") AS INTERVAL SECOND)                                         AS "CreationTime",
	CASE WHEN "USR02"."USTYP" IN ('B', 'C') THEN 'Automatic' ELSE 'Manual' END          AS "CreationExecutionType",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRP"."ERNAM"               AS "CreatedBy",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRK"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRK"."VBELN"               AS "CustomerInvoice",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRP"."MATNR"               AS "Material",
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRP"."WERKS"               AS "Plant",
    "CTE_Relationships"."SourceCustomerInvoice"                                         AS "PreviousCustomerInvoice",
    "CTE_Relationships"."SourceCustomerInvoiceLine"                                     AS "PreviousCustomerInvoiceLine"
FROM "VBRP" AS "VBRP"
    LEFT JOIN "VBRK" AS "VBRK"
            ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "VBRK"."MANDT"
                AND "VBRP"."VBELN" = "VBRK"."VBELN"
    LEFT JOIN "USR02" AS "USR02"
            ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "USR02"."MANDT"
                AND "VBRP"."ERNAM" = "USR02"."BNAME"
    LEFT JOIN "CTE_Relationships" AS "CTE_Relationships" 
            ON <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || 
                "VBRP"."VBELN" || '::' || "VBRP"."POSNR" =
                "CTE_Relationships"."TargetCustomerInvoiceLine"
WHERE "VBRP"."MANDT" IS NOT NULL
    AND "VBRK"."VBTYP" in ('M', 'O', 'P')

sql_factory_datasets.sql:
SELECT 
    <%=sourceSystem%>  || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRP"."VBELN" || '::' || "VBRP"."POSNR"              AS "ID",
	<%=sourceSystem%>  || '::' || "LIPS"."MANDT" || '::' || "LIPS"."VBELN" || '::' || "LIPS"."POSNR"              AS "DeliveryLines"
FROM (SELECT "VBRP"."MANDT" AS "MANDT",
             "VBRP"."VGBEL" AS "VGBEL",
             "VBRP"."VGPOS" AS "VGPOS",
             "VBRP"."VBELN" AS "VBELN",
             "VBRP"."POSNR" AS "POSNR"
      FROM "VBRP" AS "VBRP"
          INNER JOIN "VBRK" AS "VBRK"
      ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "VBRK"."MANDT"
          AND "VBRP"."VBELN" = "VBRK"."VBELN"
          AND "VBRK"."VBTYP" = 'M'
      ORDER BY "VBRP"."MANDT", "VBRP"."VGBEL", "VBRP"."VGPOS") AS "VBRP"
        INNER JOIN "LIPS" AS "LIPS"
            ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "LIPS"."MANDT"
                AND "VBRP"."VGBEL" = "LIPS"."VBELN"
                AND "VBRP"."VGPOS" = "LIPS"."POSNR"
        LEFT JOIN "LIKP"
            ON "LIPS"."MANDT" = "LIKP"."MANDT"
            AND "LIPS"."VBELN" = "LIKP"."VBELN"
WHERE "LIKP"."VBTYP" = 'J'

SELECT 
    <%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBRP"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBRP"."VBELN" || '::' || "VBRP"."POSNR"                                                           AS "ID",
	<%=sourceSystem%> || '::' || "VBEP"."MANDT" || '::' || "VBEP"."VBELN" || '::' || "VBEP"."POSNR" || COALESCE('::' || "VBEP"."ETENR", '')                   AS "SalesOrderScheduleLines"
FROM "VBRP" AS "VBRP"
INNER JOIN "VBRK" AS "VBRK"
      ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "VBRK"."MANDT"
        AND "VBRP"."VBELN" = "VBRK"."VBELN"
        AND "VBRK"."VBTYP" = 'M'
INNER JOIN "VBEP" AS "VBEP"
    ON "VBRP"."MANDT" = "VBEP"."MANDT"
        AND "VBRP"."AUBEL" = "VBEP"."VBELN"
        AND "VBRP"."AUPOS" = "VBEP"."POSNR"
INNER JOIN "VBAK" AS "VBAK"
    ON "VBEP"."MANDT" = "VBAK"."MANDT"
        AND "VBEP"."VBELN" = "VBAK"."VBELN"
        AND "VBAK"."VBTYP" IN ('C', 'I')
